page.title: 06Springfield Mother's Day
page.content: A{Springfield housewife}gets up, makes breakfast for her family. When they go to school she starts work in the house. She starts in the porch and washes and sweeps it. Then she is in the kitchen,first she washes the breakfast dishes then sweeps the floor. It takes some time so when she is finished the kitchen she has a cup of coffee. She washes the cup then starts on the livingroom. She cleans the floor and the fire. Sorts the seats then she is finished in the livingroom. She's in the bathroom next and hangs up the towels. She goes upstairs and makes the beds and tidies up. It's late afternoon now so she gets the tea ready for her family. She has her tea then watches the T.V. with her family.
